Text: Its hard to describe how much we appreciate this Gaz, thx very much.
Thanks mate. It is really nice to hear that from you guys. This webrip almost did my head in!! It was like there was a higher power screwing with me!!

Thanks Gaz! Appreciate the effort it took!! 
Dont know what we'd do for our TOWIE fix without you!!
Thanks Gary, Really really appreciate this, you're a legend of Essex!
cant wait, lets hope you have some luck if you are going to try for us all Gaz, thx

Been loving your work Gary.
Anyone having trouble with this one though?  It's simply just not starting for some reason.  Perhaps a bit more time required before panic sets in...
P.

That's odd mate. What media player are you using? I tested it in VLC media (which I recommend), Windows Media Player and my TV USB port and it played in all of them ok. Maybe you have not got 100% of the file??

Sorry, forget my comment.  Downloading now.
It was actually a downloading problem, not a playing problem.  
It just couldn't find any seeds with greater than 0%, and just sat there for 15 minutes not starting to download..  I went away for an hour, and on my return,  hey presto, it's well on it's way now. 
Tragedy averted...
